```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)

US_ALBERS <- 
  "+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs"

  # File where generated answers are saved, by default in the home directory
file_nyc_2012 <- "~/Desktop/DCL/C01/nyc/nyc_2012.rds"
nyc_2012 <- read_rds(file_nyc_2012)

police_calls_2012_file <- "~/Desktop/DCL/C01/police_calls/police_calls_2012.rds"
police_calls_2012 <- read_rds(police_calls_2012_file)

nyc_2012_with_calls_file <- 
  "~/Desktop/DCL/C01/nyc_with_calls/nyc_with_calls_2012.rds"
```

# Count the number of calls per tract

```{r}
call_geometries <-
  police_calls_2012 %>% 
  select(Latitude, Longitude) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Latitude), !is.na(Longitude)) %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("Longitude", "Latitude"), crs = US_ALBERS) %>% 
  st_intersection(nyc_2012$geometry)

calls_per_tract <-
  st_contains(nyc_2012$geometry, call_geometries) %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  group_by(row.id) %>% 
  transmute(
    num_calls = n()
  ) %>% 
  unique()

nyc_2012_with_calls <-
  nyc_2012 %>% 
  mutate(
    num_calls = calls_per_tract$num_calls,
    calls_per_person = if_else(
      condition = (total_pop == 0),
      true = NA_real_,
      false = num_calls/total_pop
    )
  )

write_rds(
  x = nyc_2012_with_calls, 
  path = nyc_2012_with_calls_file, 
  compress = "gz"
)
```
